SUSPEND.CONNECTED_MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Please let the user of a suspended post know about why you decide to suspend it.
SUSPEND.CONNECTED_MESSAGE:
Hello,

as a Hearth.net custodian I just suspended your gift/wish {{post_type}} {{post_title}} ({{post_url}}), because its content is in breach of Hearth.net Terms and conditions (https://www.hearth.net/app/terms).

Please edit the text of your gift/wish so it complies with Hearth.net TCO and publish again or if not possible, delete the gift/wish.

For Hearth.net custodians community ‚Äì {{user_name}}
https://www.hearth.net/app/custodians

At Hearth.net, people help each other, give gifts and communicate with each other.

 

And sometimes miracles happen.

Trust is very important for giving. Please fill out your profile so others can get to know you better:

  • Your real name
  • Your photo, preferrably with smile üòä
  • Few word in "about me" section

Thank you for being with us ‚ù§Ô∏è
TRUST.EDIT_PROFILE_FILL_REAL_NAME: Please fill in the actual first name so people can get to know you better.
TRUST.AFTER_CREATE_MODAL: If people can get to know you better, your wishes will come true. Please fill out your profile.
TRUST.BEFORE_REPLY_MODAL: If the donor can get to know you better, he will rather choose you among the applicants.

NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_TOO_SHORT: Your post is too short. Please add a few more words.
NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_TOO_LOUD: Sorry to bother you, but please do switch off the Caps Lock. Netiquette says it equals to SHOUTING plus it looks bad. Thanks :)
NOTIFY.SERVER_MAITENANCE:
We are adding a heap of new functions right now.
Just a sec... We'll be done in a jiffy...
NOTIFY.CRITICAL_APP_ERROR:
There was an error when loading Hearth.net.

Wait a bit please and then try reload the page again.
NOTIFY.YOU_ARE_OFFLINE: Connection error Is your internet connection ok? Or modem on fire?
NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_TOO_LONG: Sorry, your text is too long.
NOTIFY.ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_FORMAT: The image is in the wrong format. You can only use these: {{ formats}}
NOTIFY.ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_SIZE: The image is too big. Maximum size is {{ maxSize }}MB
NOTIFY.ERROR_FILES_TOO_BIG: Total size of uploaded images cannot exceed {{maxSize}}MB.
NOTIFY.ERROR_BAD_IMAGE_SIZE_PX: Image resolution is too low. Minimum size is {{minSize}}x{{minSize}} pixels.
NOTIFY.ERROR_UPLOADING: Sorry, there was an error while uploading
NOTIFY.ERROR_LOCATIONS_ARE_EMPTY: Fill in location or tick box no location needed.
NOTIFY.API_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again in a little while, and let us know if there is still a problem. Thanks!

BUBBLE.MARKETPLACE_ITEM_MOOD: Here you have the choice of the nature of the gift or wish. Basically, it's about whether it's a thing, a service or an information.
BUBBLE.HIDE_POST: Tip: You can mark as hidden any post that bothers you, and you no longer wish to see.
BUBBLE.MARKETPLACE_POST_BOOKMARK: Did you know, you can add any gift or wish to the favourites so that you can access them later, whenever you want?

TUTORIAL.TITLE: Hearth.net has donned a brand new suit. Let us show you all the cool stuff hidden in its pockets.
TUTORIAL.ACTION_DONT_SHOW_ANYTHING: Don't show me a thing. I want to be like Sherlock Holmes and work it all out myself.

ERR_REPORT_TEXT_MIN_LEN: Please tell us why you are reporting the post
ERR_REPORT_TEXT_MAX_LEN: Text is too long... 2500 characters is maximum. Think Twitter or SMS.

INVITATION_STATUS.INVITATION_NOT_SENT: {{email}}: Invitation could not be sent. Perhaps invalid e-mail address?

LIMITED_POSTS_MESSAGE_UNAUTH: Hearth.net is currently expanding abroad where gifts and wishes can blossom in different languages. You will be able to modify which languages and locations you want to see on Hearth.net after login.
LIMITED_POSTS_MESSAGE_AUTH: Hearth.net is currently expanding abroad where gifts and wishes can blossom in different languages. You can modify which languages and locations you wish to see on Hearth.net in your profile

REGISTER.FRIENDLY_AGREEMENT: You also agree to be kind and respectful to other users of this network. Let's have a good time together without prejudices or judgments.
REGISTER.TITLE: Registration
REGISTER.TEXT: Your profile is just few short steps away. Almost there!
REGISTER.TEXT_FACEBOOK: Hearth.net is a generous social network full of interesting people who dare to give. Do you? You can create your profile in a snap and the world of gifts is instantly yours.

EULA.ACCEPTATION_TEXT:
By registering, I agree with the terms of use of Hearth.net.

And I also agree to behave kindly with esteem and respect to other users of this network. Without prejudices or judgments.

REGISTER.VIA_SOCIAL_NETWORKS: Or you can sign up via social network.
REGISTER.MOTIVATION_TEXT: There are hundreds of gifts and wishes waiting for you.

NOTIFY.SUCCESS_RESET_PASSWORD: One, two, three. We have sent you an email with a walkthrough for changing your password.
NOTIFY.ERROR_BROKEN_LINK:
Ouch, something is broken, this link is invalid.
Generate a new one by clicking here.
NOTIFY.ERROR_API_RESET_PASSWORD: Change of password has failed. Please try again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_RESET_PASSWORD_NOT_FILLED: Enter the new password you want to use.
NOTIFY.ERROR_SHORT_PASSWORD: This password is too short, it has to consist of at least 5 characters.
NOTIFY.ERROR_PASSWORD_AGAIN_NOT_FILLED: Please fill in the new password again for verification.
NOTIFY.ERROR_PASSWORD_DOES_NOT_MATCH: The passwords you entered do not match. Try again.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_RESEND_EMAIL: Activation e-mail has been sent to your e-mail address.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT: Victory! Your account has been activated. Welcome to Hearth.net!
NOTIFY.ERROR_BROKEN_ACTIVATION_LINK: Sorry, the account activation link is not valid.
NOTIFY.ERROR_BAD_EMAIL_FORMAT: Your email doesn't have a valid format. Please try again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_EMAIL_ALREADY_USED: This email is being used already in our app. Try another.
NOTIFY.ERROR_MAILGUN_NOT_VALID_EMAIL: Is it the correct e-mail? We could not verify it. If this is a mistake please let us know.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_REGISTERED:
Thank you for registering, you're almost with us!

We have sent a message with an activation link to your e-mail. Clicking the link will activate your account. This is to confirm your e-mail, so no one can pretend that they are you.

Please wait a moment for the e-mail to arrive. Meanwhile, feel free to check out our Marketplace to see the fun that awaits you.
NOTIFY.ERROR_ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED: You are trying to get a new password for account that hasn't been activated by clicking the link in registering confirmation e-mail. You can have it sent to you again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_UNKNOWN_EMAIL: We do not recognize this email. Please check it and try again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_LOGIN_FAILED: There was an error while logging in.
NOTIFY.ERROR_WRONG_CREDENTIALS: Login and password do not match. Please try again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_LOGIN_ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED: You are tyring to log in with account that has not been activated yet. By clicking the link in confirmation registration e-mail. You can have it sent to you again.
NOTIFY.NO_OAUTH_ACCOUNT_FOUND:
You are logging into Hearth.net with a third-party account (Facebook, Google, Twitter). However the system does not recognize this account. Perhaps you don't have a Hearth account yet, or have you registered before via e-mail?

Try to remember and sign in with a different account, or register.
NOTIFY.ERROR_REGISTRATION_BLOCKED: Sorry, but the data you have entered is not possible to use for registering with Hearth.net. If you think this is an error, please let us know about it.
NOTIFY.ERROR_EMAIL_EXISTS: This is strange but it can happen! A user with this email address is already registered. Please try another email.
NOTIFY.ERROR_EULA_REQUIRED: For successful registration you have to agree the Hearth.net terms.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_ACCOUNT_HAS_BEEN_DELETED: Your account has been removed. Completely.
NOTIFY.ERROR_NOT_VALID_EMAIL: Email format is not valid. Try again.
NOTIFY.ERROR_REGISTER: Registration has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.
NOTIFY.ERROR_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT: Account activation has failed... Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.
NOTIFY.ERROR_RESET_PASSWORD: Setting up new password has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.
NOTIFY.ERROR_RESEND_EMAIL: There was an error while sending activation e-mail.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset password.
RESET_PASSWORD.TEXT: You can set up a new password here.

FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgotten your password?
FORGOTTEN_PASSWORD.TEXT: We just need your e-mail address. So we can send you further instructions on how to reset your password.

LOGIN.TITLE: Sign in
LOGIN.VIA_SOCIAL_NETWORKS: Or you can sign in via a social network.

VERIFY_EMAIL.TITLE: Check the email
VERIFY_EMAIL.INFOTEXT: To fully use Hearth, please verify your email. It is also good for the trust between us Hearthians :-)
VERIFY_EMAIL.RETRY: Email didn't arrive? Look in spam folder or get it

CONVERSATIONS.ALL_PARTICIPANTS_HAVE_LEFT: All users have left the conversation.
CONVERSATIONS.NO_CONVERSATIONS: There are no conversations here. Can you hear the... crickets?

DIALOG_ARCHIVE.LABEL: Archive this conversation?
DIALOG_ARCHIVE.TEXT: If you archive the conversation, you can return to it whenever you want in the Archive. And you won't miss any new messages, we will notify you...

DIALOG_LEAVE.LABEL: Leave this conversation?
DIALOG_LEAVE.TEXT: If you leave the conversation, other recipients can continue with the conversation, but you will not be able to access it. No worries though. We will move the conversation to the Archive, where you can return to it via history anytime you wish.

DIALOG_DELETE.LABEL: Delete this conversation?
DIALOG_DELETE.TEXT: If you delete this conversation, you will not be able to return to it. Other recipients will still have access to it.

NOTIFY.CONVERSATION_DOESNT_EXIST: Sorry but you are trying to get into a conversation that no longer exist or you cannot access it. If you think it is an error, please let us know.
NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_TOO_LONG: Your post is too long, Mr. Shakespeare. We're sorry but our total length is 2500 characters.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_CONVERSATION_LEAVE: You left the conversation. Lone Wolf!
NOTIFY.ERROR_CONVERSATION_ARCHIVE: Sorry! There was an error in the archive.
NOTIFY.ERROR_REPLY_MESSAGE: Ooops. Error while sending the message.

NOTIFY.ERROR_NO_RECIPIENT: Don't forget to fill in the message recipients.

CREATE.SUBJECT: Subject:
CREATE.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Add the message for your lucky recipients...

NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_MISSING: No text entered? Did you forget to fill in the message?

NOTIFY.SUCCESS_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Boom! Your account has been deleted! :(
NOTIFY.ERROR_DELETE_FAILED_COMMUNITY_OWNER: Before deleting your account, please hand over administration of your groups, or delete them.
NOTIFY.ERROR_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Deleting account has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.
NOTIFY.ERROR_OLD_PASS_IS_NOT_VALID: You have entered an invalid current password. Curse that Caps Lock!
NOTIFY.ERROR_NOT_FILLED_NEW_PASS: Please fill in the new password that you want to set.
NOTIFY.ERROR_TOO_SHORT_NEW_PASS: New password has to be at least 5 characters!
NOTIFY.ERROR_CHANGE_LANGUAGE: Switching language has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.
NOTIFY.ERROR_PASSWORD_CHANGE: Password editing has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.

SETTINGS.USING_HEARTH_FROM_COUNTRY: You use Hearth.net mostly in this country

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications

FREQUENCY.HOW_OFTEN: How often should we send you notifications?
FREQUENCY.ONCE_DAY: Messages immediately, the rest at end of the day
FREQUENCY.ALL_ONCE_DAY: Summary at the end of the day

NOTIFICATIONS.WHICH: Which email notifications do you want to receive?
NOTIFICATIONS.ALERT_EXPIRING_POSTS: Send notifications for posts close to their expiry date (usually 3 days before expiry).
NOTIFICATIONS.ALERT_NEW_CONVERSATION: Send e-mail notifications about new conversations.
NOTIFICATIONS.ALERT_NEW_MESSAGES_IN_CONVERSATION: Send notifications of new messages in the conversation.
NOTIFICATIONS.MESSAGES_ALLOW_ONLY_POST_REPLIES: I don't want to receive messages that aren't replies to my gifts and wishes.

PASSWORD.TITLE: Change password
PASSWORD.WARNING_OMNIAUTH: You are logged in using an external social network (e.g. Facebook, Twitter), so you can't change your Hearth.net password here. If you want to change it you must log in with your email.

DELETE_PROFILE.TITLE: Delete profile
DELETE_PROFILE.DONT_LEAVE: So sad you are leaving us. But never say never, right? Please tell us why and we will work hard to get you back on board...

INVITE.TITLE: Invite friends

NOTIFY.ERROR_EMAIL_INVALID: One or more of the emails has an invalid format.
NOTIFY.ERROR_TEXT_NOT_FILLED: Fill in your invitation to friends with some text.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_INVITE_SEND: Invitation to friends has been sent.
NOTIFY.SUCCESS_INVITATION_SENT: {{email}}: Yipee, your invitation was sent successfully!
NOTIFY.ERROR_USER_ALREADY_INVITED: {{email}}: You have already invited this person to Hearth before.
NOTIFY.ERROR_USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: {{email}}: This person is already on Hearth as
NOTIFY.ERROR_SEND_INVITATION: Sending the invitation has failed. Please try again, or let us know if the problem continues.

INVITE.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Include a message in the invitation.

404.TITLE: Sorry. No such thing here :(
404.TEXT: How did you get here in the first place? If you think that it's a mistake, please let us know.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Get in touch
FEEDBACK.TEXT: We're not perfect. But with your help perhaps we can be. Please give us your feedback and we'll give you a better Hearth.net Thank you!
FEEDBACK.REMOVING_ACCOUNT_FEEDBACK: Sad to see you go. We will miss you. Please, let us know why are you leaving or how can we make Hearth.net better. We'll try to do just that, thanks!
FEEDBACK.TEXT_PLACEHOLDER: Please let us know what works for you and what doesn't. There's always room for improvement.

NOTIFY.SUCCESS_SEND_FEEDBACK: Thanks for your response! You too are helping us get better each and every day.

STORY.ABOUT: Hearth.Net is an online gifting marketplace and generosity based social network built on the principals of the gift economy. It is a place where people can reclaim their daily relationships with the generous world that surrounds them.

HEARTH.NEW_VERSION_NOTIFICATION: We have a slick new version of Hearth ready for you. Do you want to update Hearth now or later?

PRINCIPLES.DESCRIPTION: It's a big joy to give gifts! To make it easier for you to get started, we have crafted these practical from the experience of Hearth.net community with gifting over several years.
